mapper.select: SELECT MAX(T.tapAll) tapAll , MAX(T.tapWaiting) tapWaiting , MAX(T.tapProgress) tapProgress , MAX(T.tapScheduled) tapScheduled , MAX(T.tapCompleted) tapCompleted , MAX(T.tapCancelled) tapCancelled FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) tapAll,0 tapWaiting,0 tapProgress,0 tapScheduled,0 tapCompleted,0 tapCancelled FROM QS Q INNER JOIN COM_CODE C ON Q.QS_TYPE = C.COM_NO WHERE 1=1 UNION ALL SELECT 0,COUNT(*),0,0,0,0 FROM QS Q INNER JOIN COM_CODE C ON Q.QS_TYPE = C.COM_NO WHERE 1=1 AND Q.QS_TYPE = 'QS01' UNION ALL SELECT 0,0,COUNT(*),0,0,0 FROM QS Q INNER JOIN COM_CODE C ON Q.QS_TYPE = C.COM_NO WHERE 1=1 AND Q.QS_TYPE = 'QS02' UNION ALL SELECT 0,0,0,COUNT(*),0,0 FROM QS Q INNER JOIN COM_CODE C ON Q.QS_TYPE = C.COM_NO WHERE 1=1 AND Q.QS_TYPE = 'QS03' UNION ALL SELECT 0,0,0,0,COUNT(*),0 FROM QS Q INNER JOIN COM_CODE C ON Q.QS_TYPE = C.COM_NO WHERE 1=1 AND Q.QS_TYPE = 'QS04' UNION ALL SELECT 0,0,0,0,0,COUNT(*) FROM QS Q INNER JOIN COM_CODE C ON Q.QS_TYPE = C.COM_NO WHERE 1=1 AND Q.QS_TYPE = 'QS05' ) T

SELECT MEM.MBR_NM , C.COM_NM AS QS_TYPE_NM , Q.WRTR_DT , Q.QS_TTL , Q.QS_TYPE , Q.QS_CN , Q.ANS_CN , Q.ANS_DT , Q.MNGR_ID , MNGR.MBR_NM AS MNGR_NM , Q.QS_SEQ , FD.FILE_SN , FD.FILE_GROUP_NO , FD.FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME , FD.FILE_SAVE_NAME , FD.FILE_SAVE_LOCATE , FD.FILE_SIZE , FD.FILE_EXT , FD.FILE_MIME , FD.FILE_FANCYSIZE , FD.FILE_SAVE_DATE , FD.FILE_DOWNCOUNT FROM QS Q LEFT OUTER JOIN MNGR MN ON Q.MNGR_ID = MN.MNGR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER MEM ON Q.MBR_ID = MEM.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER MNGR ON MN.MNGR_ID = MNGR.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE C ON C.COM_NO = Q.QS_TYPE LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_GROUP FG ON Q.FILE_GROUP_NO = FG.FILE_GROUP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_DETAIL FD ON FG.FILE_GROUP_NO = FD.FILE_GROUP_NO WHERE Q.QS_SEQ = #{qsSeq}
